content.text: On Wednesday, they pick a total of \(89\mathrm{kg}\) of strawberries
The mean mass of each strawberry is \(22\mathrm{g}\)
Work out the number of strawberries they picked
Give your answer correct to the nearest 10
On Thursday, they pick a total of 4650 strawberries
They fill each box with 35 strawberries
How many boxes do they fill?
On Saturday, they sell 208 boxes of strawberries at \$3.25 for each box
Work out how much money they receive
On Monday, they receive \$390 for their boxes of strawberries
They share this money in the ratio  Alison : Bob : Jenny = 7 : 3 : 2
Work out how much money they each receive
In 2016, they picked a total of \(3500\mathrm{kg}\) of strawberries
In 2017, they picked a total of \(3080\mathrm{kg}\) of strawberries
Work out the percentage decrease in the mass of strawberries they picked from 2016 to 2017
An open box in the shape of a cuboid is \(7\mathrm{cm}\) long, \(5\mathrm{cm}\) wide and \(4\mathrm{cm}\) high
Complete the net of the box
The base of the box has been drawn for you
Three people pick strawberries
The strawberries are sold in boxes
In May, 6 films were shown and in June, 4 films were shown
Complete the bar chart
How many more films were shown in March than were shown in January?
The bar chart shows the number of different films shown at a cinema in each of four months
The cinema is open from 13 30 to 23 15 every day
Work out how long the cinema is open in one week
Give your answer in hours and minutes
One Monday afternoon, the cinema sells 24 adult tickets, 16 child tickets and 8 senior tickets
Work out the total amount of money received for these tickets
One Tuesday, there are 24 children out of the 80 people in the cinema
Find the percentage of these people that are children
A film lasts for 85 minutes
It starts at 19 40
Find the time when the film ends
Another film lasts for 2 hours 45 minutes
It finishes 10 minutes before the closing time of 23 15
Find the time that it starts
In the cinema café, Harry buys a cup of tea for \$1.85 and a cake for \$1.70
Work out the change he receives from a \$5 note
Work out the difference in these temperatures
The temperature in the freezer rises by \(3^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
Work out the new temperature in the freezer
In the café, the fridge has a temperature of \(4^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\) and the freezer has a temperature of \(- 17^{\circ}\mathrm{C}\)
Simplify
Solve
Factorise completely
Make \(r\) the subject of the formula
Describe fully the single transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto triangle \(B\)
Describe fully the single transformation that maps triangle \(A\) onto triangle \(C\)
Translate triangle \(A\) by the vector \(\begin{pmatrix} 2 \\ 5 \end{pmatrix}\)
Reflect triangle \(A\) in the line \(x = 3\)
Triangles \(A, B\) and \(C\) are shown on the grid
Draw all the lines of symmetry on the rectangle below
Work out the size of one interior angle of a regular hexagon
The diagram shows a plan of a garden
Work out the area of the garden
The diagram shows an isosceles triangle, \(ABC\). \(BCD\) is a straight line
Find the value of \(x\)
This diagram shows the cross-section of the pipe
Work out the shaded area
The cylinder is \(18 \text{cm}\) long
Work out the volume of the metal
Work out the curved surface area of the outside of the pipe
The diagram shows a hollow metal pipe in the shape of a cylinder
Write down the mode
Calculate the mean
Jules says that the median is 3.5
Show that he is wrong
70 people each attempt a driving test
Each person repeats the test until they pass
The results are shown in the table
What type of correlation is shown in the scatter diagram?
One of these people is picked at random
Work out the probability that this person had 5 or more attempts
Draw a line of best fit on the scatter diagram
Another person had 15 lessons
Estimate their number of attempts
The number of attempts at a driving test and the number of driving lessons for each of 17 people are shown in the scatter diagram
Write in figures the number eight million and twenty three thousand
Write these in order of size, starting with the smallest
prime,
a multiple of 13,
irrational
Write down a number from this list that is
The number, \(n\) , is given as 5300, correct to 2 significant figures
Complete this statement about the value of \(n\)
Without using a calculator, work out \(1\frac{3}{4}\times 1\frac{2}{7}\)
Show all your working and give your answer as a mixed number in its simplest form
Complete the table of values for \(y = 8x - x^{2}\)
On the grid, draw the graph of \(y = 8x - x^{2}\) for \(0 \leqslant x \leqslant 8\)
Write down the equation of the line of symmetry of this graph
Use the graph to solve \(8x - x^{2} = 10\)
The diagram shows a right-angled triangle
Find the value of \(x\)
Work out the area of the triangle
Give the units of your answer
Calculate the perimeter of the triangle
The diagram shows another right-angled triangle
